item.title: Limit concurrency
item.description:
Table of contents Introduction Problem statement How to limit number of goroutines started package main import ( "fmt" "sync" ) func main() { var wg sync.WaitGroup totalGoRoutines := 5 fmt.Println("Start
") for i := 0; i < totalGoRoutines; i++ { wg.Add(1) go counter(i, &wg) } wg.Wait() fmt.Println("

Done!") } // Prints count number func counter(count int, wg *sync.WaitGroup) { defer wg.Done() fmt.Printf("Count: %d
", count) } Output: Reference
